## geom-splines package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [closedCubicFromBreakPoints](./geom-splines.closedcubicfrombreakpoints.md) |  |
|  [closedCubicFromControlPoints](./geom-splines.closedcubicfromcontrolpoints.md) |  |
|  [closestPointCubic](./geom-splines.closestpointcubic.md) | Performs recursive search for closest point to <code>p</code> on cubic curve defined by control points <code>a</code>,<code>b</code>,<code>c</code>,<code>d</code>. The <code>res</code> and <code>recur</code> params are used to control the recursion behavior. If <code>eps</code> is given, the search is terminated as soon as a point with a shorter \*squared\* distance than <code>eps</code> is found.[minError](./math.minerror.md) |
|  [closestPointQuadratic](./geom-splines.closestpointquadratic.md) | Performs recursive search for closest point to <code>p</code> on quadratic curve defined by control points <code>a</code>,<code>b</code>,<code>c</code>. The <code>res</code> and <code>recur</code> params are used to control the recursion behavior. If <code>eps</code> is given, the search is terminated as soon as a point with a shorter \*squared\* distance than <code>eps</code> is found.[minError](./math.minerror.md) |
|  [cubicBounds](./geom-splines.cubicbounds.md) |  |
|  [cubicFromArc](./geom-splines.cubicfromarc.md) | Converts elliptic arc into a 1-4 cubic curve segments, depending on arc's angle range.<!-- -->Partially based on: [https://github.com/chromium/chromium/blob/master/third\_party/blink/renderer/core/svg/svg\_path\_parser.cc\#L253](https://github.com/chromium/chromium/blob/master/third_party/blink/renderer/core/svg/svg_path_parser.cc#L253) |
|  [cubicFromLine](./geom-splines.cubicfromline.md) | Converts line segment <code>a</code> -<!-- -->&gt; <code>b</code> into a cubic curve, which when sampled yields uniformly spaced points. The inner control points are located at 1/3 and 2/3 respectively. |
|  [cubicFromQuadratic](./geom-splines.cubicfromquadratic.md) |  |
|  [cubicPointAt](./geom-splines.cubicpointat.md) | Same as thi.ng/vectors/mixCubic |
